state: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First of all, you could, like, go to the south. With that accomplished, make an attempt to move south. Once you get around to doing that, attempt to go to the east. After that, go south. And then, take a trip west. And then, venture west. Once you do that, make an attempt to go north. After that, make an attempt to travel west. Then, retrieve the garlic clove from the floor of the laundry place. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Parlor =- You find yourself in a parlor. A standard one. You make out a safe. What a letdown! The safe is empty! You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a couch. The couch is typical. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. There is an open hatch leading east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Parlor =-0/1
next_state: -= Cookhouse =- You find yourself in a cookhouse. You start to take note of what's in the room. You can see a fridge. Hey, want to see a bowl? Look over there, a bowl. However, the bowl, like an empty bowl, has nothing on it. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west. > -= Cookhouse =-0/2
